columns.Code: The unique identifier for each manufacturer.
columns.Name: The name of the manufacturing company.
columns.Headquarter: The location of the manufacturer's main office.
columns.Founder: The individual who established the manufacturing company.
columns.Revenue: The annual revenue generated by the manufacturer.

Manufacturers.table_description: The Manufacturers table stores data about manufacturing companies.

columns.Code: The unique identifier for each product.
columns.Name: The name of the product being sold.
columns.Price: The selling price of the product.
columns.Manufacturer: The identifier of the product's manufacturer.

Products.table_description: The Products table stores data about various products.
